'''Ruin Machine Core''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained after defeating a [[Ruin Cruiser]] and a [[Ruin Guard]] during the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] "[[Abducted Merchant in Chenyu Vale]]".

It is used to activate an abandoned Ruin Guard blocking a cave nearby.
